output: A rustic wooden cabin stands bathed in the soft golden hues of dusk against a backdrop of freshly fallen snow. Gently swirling snowflakes dance around it, each one gleaming with delicate iridescence under the fading sunlight. The scene is serene and tranquil, evoking a sense of peaceful solitude.
